Introduction
This topic contains information on the exchange of information between VA and the RPCs, including
automatic transmission of VA award-adjustment data to RPCs
, and
how RPCs notify ROs of necessary award adjustments
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section C - Coordinating Military Retired Pay (MRP) Cases With Retired Pay Centers (RPCs) and Service Departments
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section C
